steps.stepDescription: Open the web browser and navigate to https://www.marcusmillichap.com/
Click on the Sign In button to display the login form
Enter the email address 'p.s.farwaha@gmail.com' in the email input field
Click the Continue button to reveal the password field
Fill in the password field with the password 'GeckDemo05'
Submit the login form by clicking the appropriate Sign In or Login button
Verify that the user lands on the home page by checking for the text 'Global Reach, Local Expertise'
Take a screenshot of the completed home page to confirm the successful login
